relax.text: You are relaxing 🛋️ in your living room when you hear a knock on the door 🚪.

answer.text: You open the door 🚪 and see a pizza man 🍕 who says "I have your pizza!"

judochop.text: "I KNEW THESE LESSONS WOULD PAY OFF" he says as he performs an effortless dodge into a leg sweep 🌀🦵.
judochop.lose: 🦴 You have a broken leg and no pizza. 😭

thanks.text: He hands you your pizza 🍕 with a smile 😊.

notmine.text: "Oh this is 1603 not 1630. Sorry" he says while walking away 🚶‍♂️.

ignore.text: You ignore the door 🙉 and after a few more knocks, you hear a thud on the roof 🏠.

gooutside.text: You open the door 🚪 and see a pizza guy 🍕. He says "NEXT TIME OPEN THE DOOR EARLIER" and judo chops you 🥋.

wait.text: You hear a squeal of tires in rage driving 🚗💨.

gooutside2.text: You go outside and see a pizza 🍕 on your roof 🏠. You use your ladder 🪜 to get it.

ignoritis.text: You ignore it but die from ignorits 😵.
